ygData.subject: Addition to the petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is another idea that I just thought of that we can add to the petition. I was thinking why not increase the amount of songs we can memorize at one time. 8
ygData.messageBody:
Here is another idea that I just thought of that we can add to the petition.
I was thinking why not increase the amount of songs we can memorize at one
time. 8 might be satisfying to the caster but to me I want more. We all
agreed that each one of our songs are unique right rather than like pure
casters where most of their spells are an upgrade. Would it not be great
for us to beable to mem more than 8 since each songs takes us so long to
mem. With caster, each spell they have to mem takes them like 2 seconds.
With our songs it takes forever.

I was thinking of we start out with 8 slots only. Then each 4 lvl after lvl
20, we get 1 extra slot to mem our songs.

What do u all think?

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Bad Apple, The Rathe
